        public abstract java.util.List<Item> scrape​(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient client,
                                            java.lang.String keyword,
                                            javafx.scene.control.TextArea textAreaConsole)
        Each portal scraper should implement the scrape function to scrape items from the portal by keyword
        Parameters:
        client - WebClient for getting web page from web
        keyword - Keyword for search on portal
        textAreaConsole - TextArea on GUI interface, showing program activity
        Returns:
        List of search result from the portal
